name: Upsilon
tagline: We know how to turn your ideas into reality!
description:
Upsilon is an outsourcing company located in Eastern Europe. We offer dedicated teams of professionals to work on software projects of any size and difficulty. We can staff your project with experts in Back-end and Front-end Web Development, Mobile Development, Machine Learning, DevOps, QA, and UI/UX.
With over six years history of consistently meeting customer expectations, we are the best choice for your Next Big Thing.
